message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to be flexible. I'm thinking of a compromise. I'll meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer. I'll sell the product to you for $10500. This is the best I can do at this point.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $9500, which is closer to my budget.  If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to consider my other options.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500. I'll make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $10750. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value of the product.
